extendedInfo.description: Consumers supporting Companies supporting CommunitiesThe CoMarket app allows shoppers to receive coupons, special offers and loyalty rewards from companies while supporting not-for-profit organizations in their community. CoMarket replaces easy-to-lose member cards, clip-out coupons, and reward stamp cards with one simple application. No more digging through your purse or wallet at the cash registerâsimply check-in using your Android or iPhone device and save with the CoMarket App. Each time you check-in, participating companyâs donate to the not-for-profit organizations of your choice.How to Get Started:Download the FREE CoMarket app & Register for your FREE accountLink to your favorite organizations by scanning their QRCode or searching for them and adding them to your contactsShop at participating companies and SCAN their QR code on each visitSAVE with coupons, special offers and loyalty rewardsEach scan will help to SUPPORT organizations that serve your communityOther features include:Search: Find local companies most highly recommended by your network.Connections: Support your favorite local companies by using the CoMarket network to recommend their services to others.My Account: Manage your CoMarket account from your smart phone.Coupon Wallet: Conveniently store your coupons on your smart phone.Automatic Updates: Get instant promotions from your favorite stores.Contacts: Build your network by connecting with others:  consumers, companies, and communities.

reviews.title: LOVE IT
reviews.comment: This app is getting better each and every day! Love the way I can find places!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where Social Media meets Geo Searching
reviews.comment: I love the way I search for a restaurant and its able to rank, sort, and find the best match no only based on my keyword but the friends in my social network.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for searching and saving!
reviews.comment: Absolutely love being able to search for businesses and see if they are offering any special promotions before I even get to the location. Makes deciding where to spend money much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CoMarket is so easy to find my favorite businesses
reviews.comment: CoMarket is so easy to find my favorite businesses
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great tool for biz to communicate with customers and manage Loyalty and coupon campaign... Makes Groupon look like highway robbery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the most cohesive & forward-looking App of its kind for finding the best deals on what you want from local merchants & service providers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app screws up my keyboard. I assigns numbers to the wrong keys.
reviews.author: A Google User
